attributes.action:
we don't want control parking zone.
so we can park and shop freely.
attributes.additional_details: the revenue generated from parkin each year is a evidence ,and i don't have govt data excess to see how many peoples win the appeal against there parking penalty, most of the time they was issued wrongly parking penalty.we have business permit but if we go for delivery out of our area even less then a mile we have to think many time.and most of the time we have to come back with parking penalty.
attributes.background:
where we live we have to buy a parking permit to park our car.
but we are restricted to park within even 1 miles,they just give us 7 to 10 road,.but if we are working or visiting our friends we have to buy each time visitors permit,or business permit,otherwise get ticket.(we want 10 miles area)

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Parking is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
